headline: Mondelēz International to Present at CAGNY Conference on February 17
summary: CHICAGO, Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelēz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) announced that Dirk Van de Put, Chairman & CEO, and Luca Zaramella, EVP & Chief Financial Officer will present at the annual Consumer Analyst Group of New York (CAGNY) Conference on February 17 at 2:00 p.m. ET. A listen-only webcast will be provided at www.mondelezinternational.com and a replay of the event will also be available on the company's website. About Mondelēz International Mondelēz International, In

headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: Mondelez (MDLZ) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
